entry.def: Something that is spiked has one or more spikes on it.
If someone has spiked hair, their hair is short and sticks up all over their head.

means.word_mean: 1. equipped with long sharp-pointed projections especially along the top of a wall or fence;

sentences.sentence: "the fence was iron and spiked along the top"
"he drank too much of the spiked punch"
